message: The tower's interior matches its exterior窶病ll white.
The floors and walls and ceilings are polished to a mirror finish, giving it a cold, clinical feel.
I've heard the tower has some areas that are open to the public, but there aren't any guests around.
I can hear footsteps, so there must be guards on patrol.
We make our way down the lengthy hallway amidst the suffocating calm.
After walking for a bit, we see an elevator ahead of us. Two guards are standing by it.
We approach.

name: 蒼葉
message: "The invitation says to go to the top floor."

name: クリア
message: "That's where Toue's office is."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I really don't like the sound of that."
The guards stare coldly at us as we board the elevator.
I press the button for the top floor. Slowly, the elevator begins to ascend.
Clear leans against the wall of the elevator, panting.
I can see the pain on his face.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Does it hurt?"

name: クリア
message: "...I'm fine. It'll go away if I rest for a while."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But―"

name: クリア
message: "I'm fine. We need to keep going."
I remember the sparks flying out of Clear's arm. Is he really okay?
An awkward silence hangs between us as the elevator slows to a stop. The door opens.
It's nothing like the ground floor. There, there was at least some decor to welcome guests, but this floor is utterly featureless.

name: 蒼葉
message: "This is where Toue is?"

name: クリア
message: "No, this is the research area. There's an elevator to Toue's office in the back. This area is typically off-limits to visitors."

name: クリア
message: "But that invitation should get us through."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Research area... This is where they experiment on people?"

name: クリア
message: "Yes, but this is only one of his labs. Toue has facilities on the mainland as well."
We proceed down the empty hall, tension building all the while.
Eventually, we reach a door.
There's a screen next to the door. I present my invitation.

name: 認証モニター
message: "Confirmed. Please proceed."
When the door opens, I see another elevator at the end of the hall.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm guessing that's the elevator that goes to Toue's office."

name: クリア
message: "Yes."
After showing the invitation to yet another authentication screen, we board the elevator and head to the top floor.
The elevator soon reaches its destination and opens its doors.
This floor is different from the research area. A bright red door stands directly in front of us.
We walk up to it and enter.
